name: SmartContinente
0:
”Alexa, open smart continente”
”Alexa, ask smart continente to add bananas”
”Alexa, ask smart continente what do I have on my shopping list”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart continente
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill allows you to build a shopping list/cart with you voice, impressively fast.
Say "Add wine and meat and strawberries and chocolate and flowers." and get yourself ready for that special dinner.
To use this skill you will need an account on Continente Online (www.continente.pt) and the companion app SmartContinente (available on App Store and Google Play).
